content:
# The iron ore has been successfully inserted into the stone furnace, which is currently working and has 9 iron ore remaining.
# 
# The furnace has produced a total of 27 iron plates so far. I need to allow the furnace to continue smelting the remaining iron ore into plates.
# 
# While waiting for the furnace to finish smelting, I will keep monitoring the situation. Since I can't craft the Iron Gear Wheels or the Assembling Machine yet, I will focus on gathering more resources if necessary.

# I will wait for a little while to see how many additional iron plates the furnace can produce after inserting the new iron ore.

sleep(10)  # Wait for another 10 seconds to allow the furnace to continue smelting.
# After waiting, I will check the status of the furnace and my inventory again.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(stone_furnace)  # Checking the stone furnace's inventory to see how many iron plates have been produced.
print(f"Stone Furnace inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Displaying the furnace's inventory status.
